title: No. 1 On the Charts : A Look at the Australian Pop Music Industry
creator_credit: TV Ed Productions, David Ferris, Trevor Lunn and Don Fitzsimmons
brief_description: Lee Simon, Basia Bonkowski, Jane Clifton and Michael Gudinski are interviewed in a forum style program about their views on the presentation of popular culture in the media. Video clips are interposed throughout the program.
